effect.Name: Exclusion
effect.description: Exclusion - It works similarly to the "Difference", but produces more subtle effects. When the colors are similar, the result will be dark, and when they are different, the result will be lighter
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Exclusion (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: It works similarly to the "Difference", but produces more subtle effects. When the colors are similar, the result will be dark, and when they are different, the result will be lighter

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
